tag_list: aviv, revach, ecommerce, advertising, mobile, games, content, porting, distribution, mominis, tel-aviv, israel, entrepreneur
overview:
Aviv Revach is a bottom-line driven serial entrepreneur, selected by TheMarker Business Magazine as one of Israels Most Promising Entrepreneurs.

Aviv is the Founder, CEO of Commerce Sciences, active in the e-commerce space. Prior to that, Aviv was the Co-Founder, VP Business Development of MoMinis, which offers an innovative mobile games development and distribution platform. In addition to the companies he established, Aviv co-founded MobileMonday Tel-Aviv, a branch of a global community of mobile industry CEOs, entrepreneurs and influentials.

Aviv has a proven experience in establishing a global, market-facing startup company, from conception to fruition. He holds extensive understanding of market trends and technologies with adequate in-depth understanding in the fields of e-commerce, mobile content/services, and new media.

As a respected figure in the hi-tech industry, Aviv judged various global startup competitions including- “2011 European Intel Challenge”, “2010 European Intel Challenge”, “2010 Mobile Premier Awards” and “2010 Madrid Network Challenge”.
